definition: National Police Agency (Taiwan)/abbr. for 內政部警政署|内政部警政署[Nei4 zheng4 bu4 Jing3 zheng4 shu3]

pinyin: Nei4 zheng4 bu4 Jing3 zheng4 shu3

sentences.english: The daughter reported her mother to the National Police Agency and the Hsinchu County Police Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 这位女儿向内政部警政署和新竹县警察局报案。

pinyin: Nei4 zheng4 bu4 Jing3 zheng4 shu3

definition: Executive Yuan, the executive branch of government under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
Legislative Yuan, the legislative branch of government under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan

William Lai Ching-te (1959-), Taiwanese DPP politician, vice president of the Republic of China from 2020
Chen Chien-jen (1951-), Taiwanese politician, vice president of the Republic of China 2016-2020
DPP (Democratic Progressive Party, Taiwan)/abbr. for 民主進步黨|民主进步党
Ko Wen-je (1959-), Taiwanese independent politician, Mayor of Taipei City from 2014
Ma Ying-jeou (1950-), Taiwanese Kuomintang politician, Mayor of Taipei 1998-2006, president of Republic of China 2008-2016
